name: Blóm
description:
"Blóm" is a video game developed by ENJMIN students in one month for a group project. It was made entirely in Java with Processing.

Just relax yourself, blow on some flowers to make the seeds fly and see the result.

Developers : Orlandini Clément, Clément Julia, Zelvelder Nicolas

Inspiration : "FLÖRA" https://www.behance.net/gallery/74314999/FLOERA
